name: Bomb it (Rad Developer)
description:
Long after the 99th King of the Netherworld died, the kingdom became a paradise for those still there. Lately though, odd creatures have been appearing around in Forest Park and residents don't know much about it.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys for movement
  • Z for placing bombs
  • X for placing mines

Rules:

  • Slimes are cute but dangerous. They can kill you.
  • You can get killed in explosions.
  • Mines explode when enemies step on them.

Do drop a comment and let me know what you think of the game! I will continue to update this game over time, follow me in case you're interested :D
